# Flow of the Day
 
- Arrive at The Graduate Hotel â€“ Piedmont Room by 8:45am ET. Dress is business casual. Continental breakfast will be served.
- Choose your own seats (ideally with your group members). Your slides will be queued up based upon the schedule that has already been shared.
- Pay attention to the schedule. Groups will present for 7 minutes, with 3 minutes for Q&A.
Someone will have a sign letting you know you have 2 minutes remaining, then one minute remaining, and 30 seconds to go.
- As soon as the group before you finishes their presentation, quietly move to the front during Q&A to begin on time.
- Lunch will be served at the hotel.
- Following Closing Remarks & Awards, head to The Rotunda for a MSDS Residential class photo.
- After photos, join us for a Capstone Presentation Day Pizza Party on The Corner!
- Our faculty, staff, and Capstone sponsors are really excited to hear of your experiences. Have questions? Check here first, then reach out to me or Prof. Alvarado.
